p: To evaluate whether EPP exhibited cytotoxicity through apoptosis in both OS cell lines, a DAPI staining analysis was performed to observe nuclear morphological changes ( Figure 3B). Such analysis demonstrated that the exposure of OS cells to EPP induced apoptosis in a dose dependent manner; indeed, both SaOS-2 and MNNG cells showed loss of regular shape and well-defined boundaries. Moreover, at the highest concentration tested (2*IC 50), EPP exhibited a more remarkable apoptotic effect against MNNG than SaOS-2 with greater nuclear fragmentation, chromatin condensation and nuclear blebbing.
